Label: Arrest
Description: An apprehension of a subject by a peace official based on an observed or a reported violation of a law or ordinance

Label: Arrest Charge
Description: A formal allegation of a violation of a statute and/or ordinance in association with an arrest

Label: Attorney
Description: An attorney

Label: Booking
Description: An administrative step taken after an arrested subject is brought to a police station or detention facility

Label: Booking Facility
Description: A facility where a subject is detained as a result of booking

Label: Case Defendant Party
Description: An entity being charged or sued in a court of law

Label: Case Defense Attorney
Description: An attorney who defends a subject in a case

Label: Case Initiating Attorney
Description: An attorney who initiated a case

Label: Case Initiating Party
Description: An entity that initiated a case

Label: Case Judge
Description: A judge associated with a case

Label: Charge
Description: A formal allegation that a specific person has committed a specific offense

Label: Court
Description: A court or a unit of a court responsible for trying justice proceedings

Label: Judge
Description: An official who hears and decides cases brought before a court of law

Label: Law Enforcement Official
Description: A peace official who has the authority to enforce the law

Label: Register Action
Description: An entry in a register of actions in a case

Label: Register Of Actions
Description: A chronological list of filings in a case

Label: Release
Description: A release of a subject from booking or from booking detention

Label: Sentence
Description: A punishment imposed on a person convicted of a crime

Label: Sentence Term
Description: A duration of a sentence

Label: Person
Description: A human being

Label: Civil Case
Description: A civil court case in the SCALES knowledge graph

Label: Criminal Case
Description: A criminal court case in the SCALES knowledge graph

Label: Firm
Description: Links to a law firm entity

Label: Party
Description: Links to a party entity

Label: NIBRS report category code
Description: FBI National Incident-Based Reporting System (NIBRS) report category code

Label: offense UCR code
Description: FBI Uniform Crime Reporting (UCR) offense code

Label: county code
Description: FIPS code identifying a US county

Label: arrest official
Description: A peace official who makes an arrest

Label: attorney
Description: An attorney

Label: bond amount
Description: A monetary amount approved for bond

Label: bond type
Description: A kind of bond (e.g., cash, surety)

Label: booking facility
Description: A facility where a subject is detained as a result of booking

Label: booking release
Description: Details about a release of a subject from booking or detention

Label: case
Description: An aggregation of information about a set of related activities and events

Label: case charge
Description: A charge or accusation a person is being tried for in a court of law

Label: case court
Description: A court in which a case is being tried

Label: case defendant party
Description: An entity being charged or sued in a court of law

Label: case defense attorney
Description: An attorney who defends a subject in a case

Label: case initiating attorney
Description: An attorney who initiated a case

Label: case initiating party
Description: An entity that initiated a case

Label: case judge
Description: A judge associated with a case

Label: case official role text
Description: A role played by an official in a case

Label: charge booking
Description: A booking associated with a charge

Label: charge disposition
Description: The final outcome or result of a charge

Label: charge disposition category text
Description: A kind of charge disposition (e.g., dismissed, guilty plea)

Label: charge sentence
Description: A sentence given to a person convicted of a charge

Label: charge sequence ID
Description: A unique identifier for a charge in a case

Label: charge severity level code
Description: A level of severity of a charge (e.g., felony, misdemeanor)

Label: charge subject
Description: A person alleged or found to have committed a crime

Label: charge text
Description: A text description of a charge

Label: court category code
Description: A kind of court (e.g., appellate, circuit, district)

Label: court name
Description: A name of a court unit

Label: drug category code
Description: A kind of drug (e.g., narcotic, stimulant)

Label: judicial official category text
Description: A kind of judicial official (e.g., judge, magistrate)

Label: participant role category text
Description: A kind of role played by a participant in a case

Label: person charge
Description: A charge associated with a person

Label: person sex code
Description: A code identifying the gender or sex of a person

Label: register action date
Description: A date a register of actions entry was filed

Label: register action description text
Description: A description of an entry in the docket or register of actions

Label: sentence
Description: A punishment imposed on a person convicted of a crime

Label: sentence description text
Description: A description of the sentence imposed

Label: sentence term
Description: A duration of a sentence

Label: statute keyword text
Description: A keyword or phrase describing a statute

Label: subject booking
Description: A booking of a subject

Label: term duration
Description: A specific length of time

Label: activity date
Description: A date of an activity

Label: address postal code
Description: A postal code or ZIP code

Label: administrative ID
Description: An identifier assigned for administrative purposes

Label: case docket ID
Description: An identifier used to reference a case in a docket

Label: case general category text
Description: A broadly defined kind of case

Label: case sub category text
Description: A more specific classification of a kind of case

Label: contact mailing address
Description: A postal mailing address for contact purposes

Label: court name
Description: A name of a court or court unit

Label: court postal code
Description: A postal code for the location of a court

Label: end date
Description: An end date of an activity or event

Label: entity name
Description: A name of an entity

Label: facility name
Description: A name of a facility

Label: jurisdiction text
Description: An area in which an organization or person has some kind of authoritative capacity or responsibility

Label: locale census block ID
Description: A census block identifier

Label: organization name
Description: A name of an organization

Description: A complete name of a person

Label: person sex text
Description: A gender or sex of a person

Label: start date

Label: status description text
Description: A description of a status

Label: birth year
Description: The year in which a person was born

Description: Links a booking event to a criminal case

Label: docket entry
Description: A specific entry in the court docket

Label: docket table
Description: The table of docket entries for a case

Label: firm
Description: Links to a law firm entity

Label: ontology label
Description: A label from the ontology vocabulary

Description: Links to a party entity

Description: Indicates which party appointed an attorney

Label: assigned to defendant
Description: Indicates assignment of an attorney to a defendant

Description: Specifies the type of criminal or civil charge

Description: The date on which a judge was commissioned

Description: Additional information not captured in other fields

Description: In forma pauperis (IFP) judge attribution information
